dialogue.speaker: Colette
dialogue.text: Oh great... this is actually happening...

dialogue.speaker: Little Colette
dialogue.text: Mommy told me not to talk to strangers.

dialogue.speaker: Little Colette
dialogue.text: Okay then! Hey, I see you saw my drawing! Do you like it? It’s a drawing of me, Mommy, and Daddy!

dialogue.speaker: Colette
dialogue.text: It’s ugly. Don’t be an artist when you grow up.

dialogue.speaker: Little Colette
dialogue.text: That’s mean! Mommy told me you shouldn’t insult other people! Besides, I never wanted to be an artist.

dialogue.speaker: Colette
dialogue.text: Oh yeah? What do you want to do when you grow up?

dialogue.speaker: Little Colette
dialogue.text: Hm.... I don’t know! But I know that I want to be kind! Just like Mommy and Daddy said I should be!
